welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hasselt, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful architecture, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hasselt has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Liege Airport is one of the largest in Europe and handles a significant amount of freight traffic.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
